job.title: Food Technologist
job.description: Position: Application Food technologist Date: General description of position To develop Customer oriented solution in Galactic Front lab To present these solutions to customer and help him in the implementation process To Develop and maintain marketing material related to application To manage daily the Front lab To support our sales activities when it comes to application Report to INDDIR Task #1 : Food Application Intelligence Contents - To stay informed of market change, New technology, New testing method, - To foster and maintain a good Network of partner, external lab, knowledgeable poeple … Task #2 :Sales Support Contents -      To support Sales team during customer visit -      To develop customer training support and to train customer -      Travel time could be up to 50% Task #3 : Customer support Contents -      To help implement Galactic solution at customer site -      To make testing at customer location -      To develop Task #4 :Technical Support Contents -      To help INDDIR to develop solution based on either internal request or customer request -      To develop testing protocol/method and to either perform the test or coordinate the test with third party (meat processor, external lab -      To realize or organize production of application sample containing our solution (Bread, Ham, patties,….) -      To develop testing report for internal and external use -      To present its report to Customer when needed Task #5 : Application laboratory-day to day management Contents -      To implement µbio test, perform -      To manage on a daily basis Application front lab (to be created) in terms of method, reagent, food ingredients…. -      To propose investment in line with company strategy Task #6.:  Marketing Contents -      To develop application sheet and other marketing material needed for supporting our Sales activities -      To maintain up to date our Technical marketing support Task #7 :FSSC internal auditor Contents After being trained, to be a part of the FSSC 22000 internal audit team -      To perform internal audit as requested by QA manager Qualification needed: Education or Equivalent Experience Food Technologist with excellent written and spoken communication skills Physical Language ENGLISH Software/ Equipment Microsoft Office Tools
